statements: DELETE FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE area_name = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM land_use_monitoring WHERE change_date < '2022-01-01' AND zone_id = 3
DELETE FROM land_use_changes WHERE id = 1 AND location_id = 100;
DELETE FROM zoning_regulations WHERE effectiveness_score < 0.5 OR (zoning_area_id = 10 AND regulation_type = 'residential');
DELETE FROM policy_assessment WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM zoning_regulations WHERE region = 'City A';
DELETE FROM land_use_history WHERE parcel_id = 100 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM land_parcels WHERE zoning_category = 'residential' AND development_status = 'pending';
